item.title: The EU's Grab for the Swaps Market Poses a Systemic Risk
item.description: The EU’s Grab for the Swaps Market Poses a Systemic Risk The European Union is trying to force all over-the-counter (OTC) interest rate swaps to be cleared through central clearing counterparties (CCPs). This could lead to a systemic risk if a CCP fails.
